title: Odyssey
subtitle: The Private Data Asset Network
titleDescription: Your home to issue, manage, and consume Private Data Assets (PDAs).

forUsers.secondaryTitle: Create a Odyssey Quest space to drive your community, protocol, or DAO goals!

features.title: Your dedicated Space
features.description: Odyssey Quest space is fully customizable and modular, allowing you to control your Odyssey to web3!

features.title: Issue PDAs
features.description: Odyssey issues PDAs in a decentralized manner via our protocol and covers gas fees for any NFTs minted!

features.title: Raise Brand Awareness
features.description: Odyssey Quest space is a tool to drive social presence and promote your product.

features.title: Drive Product Engagement
features.description: Create quizzes, on-chain requirements, governance tasks, and more to engage users.

forOrganizations.mainTitle: Odyssey SDK: Native PDA Issuance and Management
forOrganizations.secondaryTitle: Implement Odyssey SDK by building PDA models, define conditions for issuance, and consumption.

features.title: Build Data Models
features.description: Build your own claim structure for data that will be stored in a PDA or use existing models.

features.title: Set Custom Conditions
features.description: Define when an issuance occurs by selecting a series of parameters that must be met.

features.title: Create Utility
features.description: Odyssey PDAs have endless usage from governance, to loyalty programs, access controls, and more!

features.title: Simple Management
features.description: Odyssey PDA model allows you to revoke a PDA, set expirations, and reissue.

features.title: User Sovereignty
features.description: Odyssey places your autonomy first. Our PDAs are privacy preserving, yet publicly verifiable. We give users control over PDA permissions and access.

features.title: Encryption
features.description: Odyssey PDA data lives on Arweave, allowing for greater encryption over individual data sets. Allowing for you to gate your digital identity and protect your digital rights.

features.title: Composability
features.description: PDA existence can be verified on-chain, while its information remains off-chain. Allowing for greater usage across web3!

buildAppsContent.title: The Odyssey Standard
buildAppsContent.description: We provide the technology needed to issue, manage, index, and utilize PDAs to build a robust digital identity.

features.title: Consumption
features.description: PDAs issued via Odyssey can be used for governance weighting, community scores, credit scores, access controls, and much more!

features.title: Odyssey Protocol
features.description: Odyssey protocol allows organizations to easily manage and issue PDAs, while Odyssey handles the indexing and curation of data-models.

features.title: Data-Providers
features.description: Every engine needs it's fuel. Odyssey's data partners support an open-source and composable data network, which serves as the basis of Odyssey PDA protocol.

orgCreation.title: Create a profile for your organization
orgCreation.description: A space for your organization issue, manage, and consume verifiable PDAs.
